name: Service has no data to return for the requested Models.

testSteps.description:
Given Mathew has a list of vehicles to be Compared:
| code | llpCode |
| IUT2018DS6L62B | 2TB |
| CUD201811WDEL75A | 245 |

And has a stateCode for the Comparison
| stateCode |
| LA |
When The user makes a post request to the Configuration-Service

children.description: Mathew executes a POST on the resource /configuration-compare/compare

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8

Content-Encoding: gzip
Content-Length: 317

restQuery.responseBody:
{
    "timestamp": 1576868423928,
    "status": 500,
    "error": "Internal Server Error",
    "exception": "com.fca.configurationcompare.svc.rest.exception.DomainServiceException",
    "message": "All models failed. Errors: unknown model (no logic tree) : ConfiguredModelDescriptionRequest(code=IUT2018DS6L62B, llpCode=2TB, configuration=standard, vin=null, options=[])/unknown model (no logic tree): ConfiguredModelDescriptionRequest(code=CUD201811WDEL75A, llpCode=245, configuration=standard, vin=null, options=[])",
    "path": "/configuration-compare/compare"
}

testSteps.description: Then Should get a 500 response with the Error Message.

userStory.storyName: Gives Appropriate error messages for Request Failures
userStory.narrative: The Service will provide enough Messages and indication of the Failure of the Request to the User.
